walkthroughs.title: King's Quest I: Quest for the Crown
walkthroughs.subtitle: The Original Fantasy Adventure
walkthroughs.description: Guide Sir Graham through his quest to become king of Daventry. Complete solutions for all three treasures and the magic mirror.
features: Both AGI and SCI versions covered

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest II: Romancing the Throne
walkthroughs.subtitle: Graham's Quest for Love
walkthroughs.description: Help King Graham rescue Princess Valanice from the tower. Navigate through fairy tale lands and solve enchanted puzzles.

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest III: To Heir Is Human
walkthroughs.subtitle: Gwydion's Escape from Manannan
walkthroughs.description: Master the art of magic as Gwydion escapes from the evil wizard Manannan. Includes complete spell guide and timing strategies.
chapters: WAY TO DAVENTRY - The Final Journey

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest IV: The Perils of Rosella
walkthroughs.subtitle: Princess on a Mission
walkthroughs.description: Guide Princess Rosella through Tamir to save her dying father. Master the day/night cycle and solve time-sensitive puzzles.

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest V: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder
walkthroughs.subtitle: Graham's Family Rescue
walkthroughs.description: The first VGA King's Quest! Help Graham rescue his family from the evil wizard Mordack with beautiful graphics and full voice acting.
chapters: Part 3: SERENIA RETURN - Magic and Mysteries
Part 6: MORDACK'S ISLAND - The Final Confrontation

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest VI: Heir Today, Gone Tomorrow
walkthroughs.subtitle: Alexander's Greatest Adventure
walkthroughs.description: The pinnacle of the King's Quest series. Navigate Alexander's quest through the Land of the Green Isles with multiple solution paths.

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest VII: The Princeless Bride
walkthroughs.subtitle: Rosella and Valanice's Adventure
walkthroughs.description: Disney-style animation meets King's Quest! Play as both Rosella and Valanice in this unique chapter-based adventure.
chapters: Chapter 1: Where In Blazes Am I?
Chapter 2: A Troll Is As A Troll Does
Chapter 4: Will The Real Troll King Please Stand Up?

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest VIII: Mask of Eternity
walkthroughs.subtitle: Connor's 3D Adventure
walkthroughs.description: The controversial 3D entry in the King's Quest saga. Guide Connor through action-RPG gameplay to restore the Mask of Eternity.

walkthroughs.title: King's Quest (2015)
walkthroughs.subtitle: A Knight to Remember
walkthroughs.description: The modern reimagining of King's Quest with beautiful art and storytelling. Guide young Graham through his adventures to become a knight.

walkthroughs.title: The Secret of Monkey Island
walkthroughs.subtitle: The Pirate Adventure Classic
walkthroughs.description: The adventure that started it all! Guide Guybrush Threepwood through his quest to become a mighty pirate in this timeless classic.

walkthroughs.title: Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge
walkthroughs.subtitle: The Pirate Saga Continues
walkthroughs.description: Guybrush's second adventure takes him across multiple islands in search of the legendary treasure Big Whoop. Features the most complex puzzles in the series.

walkthroughs.title: The Curse of Monkey Island
walkthroughs.subtitle: Hand-Drawn Pirate Paradise
walkthroughs.description: Gorgeous hand-drawn animation brings the Monkey Island world to life. Help Guybrush save Elaine from a cursed ring in this visual masterpiece.
chapters: Chapter 1: The Demise of the Zombie Pirate LeChuck
Chapter 3: Three Sheets to the Wind
Chapter 4: The Bartender, the Thieves, his Aunt and her Lover
Chapter 5: Kiss of the Spider Monkey

walkthroughs.title: Return to Monkey Island
walkthroughs.subtitle: The Creator's Return
walkthroughs.description: Ron Gilbert returns to complete his Monkey Island vision. Features modern design with classic adventure game heart and multiple difficulty modes.

walkthroughs.title: Grim Fandango
walkthroughs.subtitle: Film Noir Meets Day of the Dead
walkthroughs.description: Tim Schafer's masterpiece combining film noir with Mexican folklore. Guide Manny Calavera through the Land of the Dead in this artistic triumph.
chapters: Year 4: The Edge of the World
The Entrance to the Ninth Underworld
